example.eg: The ship with all the merchandise should arrive on January 24.
We will ship the books tomorrow.
example.egtrans: 明天我们就把书寄出去。

example.eg: I requested that the company ship my order to my home address.
example.egtrans: 我要求公司将我的订单发送至我的住家地址。

example.eg: The product will ship tomorrow.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 运送, 递送, 寄送

example.eg: For example: penmanship, swordsmanship, workmanship
For example: friendship, fellowship, comradeship
example.egtrans: 比如：朋友关系（friendship）、伙伴关系（fellowship）、同志关系（comradeship）

example.eg: For example: Ladyship
His company shipped him to Richmond to open a new office.
example.egtrans: 他被公司调去列治文，负责新办事处开设的工作。

example.eg: Let's get this ship off the ground!
Ross and Rachel are my favourite ship on that show.
Neil Armstrong's ship landed on the moon on June 20th, 1969.
The rowers shipped their oars as they pulled into shore.

dsense.name: ship [sb]⇒
dsense.guideword: (romantic relationship: support, endorse) (恋爱关系，恋情)

example.eg: I really ship those two; they're adorable together.
example.egtrans: 我真的很赞同那俩人在一起，他们俩太合适了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发送, 运送, 发出

example.eg: Container ships can carry vast amounts of cargo over huge distances.
example.egtrans: 集装箱运货船可以承载大量货物，进行长途运输。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 货柜船, 集装箱运货船

example.eg: My ideal vacation is to relax on a cruise ship in the Caribbean for seven days.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 游轮, 游艇, 旅游船

example.eg: After the naval battle the wounded were taken to the hospital ship for treatment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 弃船潜逃, 非正式离船

example.eg: If I had a rocketship, I could fly to the moon!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 火箭飞行器, 火箭推进式航空器

dsense.name: run a taut ship, run a taut operation

trans_examp.trans_cn: 纪律严明, 管理严格
海豹捕猎船, 船舶供应商

example.eg: The ship's log showed that the ship was heading northeast at the time of the collision.

dsense.name: ship's wheel
dsense.guideword: (helm: steering wheel of a sailing vessel)

dsense.name: shipping date, ship date
dsense.guideword: (day when a consignment is sent out)

example.eg: The slave ship sank in the storm and was never found.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 贩卖奴隶的船, 运奴船

example.eg: The supply ship did not arrive in port on time.
The tall ships came into the harbor with sails unfurled at each mast.
The warship was capable of firing guns, torpedoes, and missiles.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 战舰, 军舰, 舰艇

dsense.name: when your ship comes in
dsense.guideword: figurative (when you are rich or successful)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 当你成功时, 当你有了钱
